佢去working holiday
得我一個朋友 問我有咩想買?
零食我又唔好 好多香港都有
動漫野我又唔岩
飛機杯又係香港都有

有無咩實用?
除左有幾隻藥要佢買，其他都諗唔到

之前係唔係話日本傘唔錯?有咩牌子介紹
冇
日制mask
而家已經好難搵到啲香港冇得買嘅野

一定要買嫁咩，冇嘢岩嘛買少啲囉，做咩要迫自己收
買啲冇興趣嘅嘢嚟燒錢
定你哋係用錢嚟維繫感情

replies.msg: 上網睇下先

白之戀人，因為零食物語嗰個唔係正宗。對於女士來說，當然是日本正宗美容產品啦，我個日本朋友Susannah皮膚非常白和滑，主要因為用了這些美容產品。My Japanese friend Susannah is on her period. Therefore, she can't have cold drinks, coffee, tomatoes and ice cream right now. Susannah's aunt flow is visiting. She gets bad cramps right now right now so she's taken a two-day period leave. Her sister too feels bloated which means her period is gonna come soon. She has got painful stomach cramps lately as well but her period is late this month; it's two weeks late. Today, she's being so emotional as it's that time of the month again. Her cousin, Celine missed her period so she may be pregnant. Her cousin's husband did his leg workout this evening during which he overtrained his quadriceps, hamstrings and calves so he has a cramp in his legs and left foot. Susannah's brother will be attending a party next weekend but I won't be going with him for fear rhat I might cramp his style. I don't want to put any pressure on him that would cramp his style. I don't want him to be under pressure which would cramp his style.

Therefore, she can't have cold drinks, coffee, tomatoes and ice cream right now. Susannah's aunt flow is visiting. She gets bad cramps right now right now so she's taken a two-day period leave.
